org.traincontrol.marklin

Class MarklinLayoutComponent

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.traincontrol.marklin.MarklinLayoutComponent

  • public class MarklinLayoutComponent
extends java.lang.Object
    Representation of each layout component as defined by CS2 Contains initial data and references, no actual state
